addr: 2830 South Central Avenue Los Angeles, CA 90011
title: APCH Monthly Tour
desc: Come to APCH for a tour to experience a truly inclusive environment where everyone from our members to our staff feel free to share their unique qualities and contributions! Our mission at?A Place Called Home is to provide a safe haven in South Central Los Angeles where underserved youth are empowered to take ownership of the quality and direction of their lives through programs in education, arts, and well-being and are inspired to make a meaningful difference in their community and the world. Hope to see you here!
